item.description:
The Obama Deception at the New England Institute of Art



The Obama Deception is going to be played at the New England Institute of Art on;

Wednesday June 17th, 2009!
10 Brookline Place Room 1001-1002 Main Campus

The event starts at 8:00 pm and ends at 11:00 pm
There will be tables open to hand out information

item.how_to_find_us: Contact me well in advance to help or show up. Seating may be limited.
